header.description: 5+ years of experience as a developer specializing in agile methodologies and process enhancement. Proficient in application development and design,product design,testing,building,release,and maintenance for finance,education,commerce,and automotive industries. Skilled in delivering high-quality code for complex projects.

experience.company: universidad distrital francisco josé de caldas
description: Designed and implemented a new web-based platform to automate the wage calculation process for teachers at a university, considering their qualifications, research, and other factors.
Created a streamlined process documentation flow to understand stakeholder interactions with the wage calculation process.
Maintained an existing factoring web app, which allowed users to load their invoices and validate their information such as owner, date, and amount.
Built a new factoring web app for the company to handle invoice transfers between buyers and sellers, as well as added functions for loading and validating invoices.
Managed the development of a P2P lending platform that verified the personal information and credit scores of potential clients, enabling them to request credits from the company.
Facilitated connections to the government platform to verify a person's credit score, allowing for an interest rate to be set based on various factors such as demographic and economic variables.

Developed a messaging feature for the company's fraud web app that allows clients and employees to chat with each other and track the status of claims, including integration with the bank's automatic response system.
Migrated an existing web app to a new platform with improved standards and implemented end-to-end testing, improved release flow, and increased unit testing coverage on frontend code.
Maintained an existing web app that facilitated vehicle tech support, including appointments and mechanics assignments for clients.
Implemented new steps in the service appointment flow, enabling coordinators to manage technicians at Goodyear mechanical workshops.

skills.list: Typescript, Unit Testing, Graphql, E2E Testing (Cypress)
Django, Python, Redux, Angular, Redux Toolkit, Golang
Remix, NextJS, AWS S3, AWS EC2

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Systems Engineering (2017)
